comments.body: if we move this test to runtimetesting (and name it TestCacheableBase64Serializer or something) we don't have to rename this package to break a cycle

I was thinking about it a bit more, and I'm not convinced it would actually be better:
- we would be testing bas64 serializer in a different place
- pkg/runtime/testing is the testing infrastructure - putting tests to it will be misleading

[We may create yet another directory for it e.g. pkg/runtime/tests, but it would be an overkill imho]
